original_text: and the other was named Eliezer, for he said, “My father’s God was my helper; he saved me from the sword of Pharaoh.”
korean_text: 하나의 이름은 엘리에셀이라 이는 내 아버지의 하나님이 나를 도우사 바로의 칼에서 구원하셨다 함이더라

sentences.original_text: and the other was named Eliezer,
My father's God was my helper;
sentences.korean_translation: 내 아버지의 하나님이 나의 도움이 되셨고;

sentences.original_text: he saved me from the sword of Pharaoh.
